pkgmetadata.longdescription: Heterogeneous Effects Analysis of Conjoint Experiments // A tool for analyzing conjoint experiments using Bayesian Additive Regression Trees ('BART'), a machine learning method developed by Chipman, George and McCulloch (2010) doi:10.1214/09-AOAS285. This tool focuses specifically on estimating and visualizing the heterogeneity within marginal component effects, at the observation- and individual-level.
